div.p: (a) Calcification rates in the light and (b) dark [μmol hr −1 L −1 gDW −1] ± SD of Corallina officinalis before and after the common garden experiment of each population under each geographic treatment condition. Southern populations (SP1 and 2) are represented in gray, central populations (UK1 and 2) are represented in black. Statistical differences are summarized in Supporting Information Table S1
